Project¶

class vulcanforge.project.model.Project[source]¶
classmethod active_count(neighborhood_ids=None)[source]¶

Get the total number of active projects.

‘active’ for now means that a project belongs to the ‘Projects’ neighborhood and is not marked as deleted.

@param cls: @return: Number of active projects @rtype: int

add_user(user, role_names)[source]¶

Convenience method to add member with the given role(s).

@param mount_point: The mount point of the app @type mount_point: str or unicode @rtype: AppConfig

lookup

classmethod by_id(_id)[source]¶

first_mount(required_access=None)[source]¶

Returns the first (toolbar order) mount, or the first mount to which the user has the required access.

get_expanded_read_roles()[source]¶

Returns all roles that have read access

get_read_roles()[source]¶

Returns IDs of most basic role(s) that have read access

For example, if anonymous has read access this method will not return authenticated, because authenticated is a subset

classmethod icon_urls(projects)[source]¶

Return a dict[project_id] = icon_url, efficiently

classmethod menus(projects)[source]¶

Return a dict[project_id] = sitemap of sitemaps, efficiently

ordered_mounts()[source]¶

Returns an array of a projects mounts (tools and sub-projects) in toolbar order.

parent_security_context()[source]¶

ACL processing should proceed up the project hierarchy.

private_project_of()[source]¶

If this is a user-project, return the User, else None
